title: chat while loading
body: Really, we can't chat while loading? And you haven't fixed the bloody audio levels yet, even though there's ini file on my computer saying how loud everything should be exactly? I have to listen to stoopeeed loud b!tch every time I wanna play? Have you seen movie "Idiocracy"?

replies.body: Welcome to Riot....I love you.  Actually, constructive feedback is what devs crave.  You make some great points, like chatting during loading would be pretty useful I think.  Clean up your tone and focus on these ideas a bit, and let your voice be heard on the [Misc ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous)boards.  Good luck!
